note: Dr Sandeep Nayak is a renowned cancer specialist in Bangalore known for his special expertise in robotic and laparoscopic cancer surgeries. Dr Nayak also heads the surgical oncology department at Fortis hospital. Being regarded as the best oncologist in Bangalore comes with responsibility. Dr Nayak likes to contribute in the society and is associated with NGOs such as Connect to Heal and Indian Cancer Society. He also conducts cancer awareness camps.

name: Dr. Sandeep Nayak
value: https://www.drsandeepnayak.com
